meanings.definition: Measure again to determine the size, amount, or degree of something.
meanings.sent1: She decided to remeasure the room to make sure the new furniture would fit.
meanings.sent2: The tailor had to remeasure the fabric before cutting it for the dress.
meanings.sent3: After remeasuring the ingredients, she realized she had used too much salt.
meanings.sent4: Remeasuring the distance between them, he felt closer to his friend than ever before.
meanings.sent5: The scientist spent hours remeasuring the data to confirm the accuracy of the results.
